== Miami Bug Jam & F2F ==
The Ubuntu GlobalBugJam is scheduled for the weekend of 2/20 - 2/22.  <nowiki>[[http://barcamp.org/barcampmiami|BarCamp Miami]]</nowiki> is 2/22, and <nowiki>[[http://events.carsonified.com/fowa/2009/miami/|FOWA]]</nowiki> is 2/23 - 2/24.  Sounds like a perfect time to get together and get our geek on.  The fact that we have several Florida LoCo team members in Miami who we've never had a chance to meet with just makes it even better.

We'll be meeting at <nowiki>[[http://brikolodge.wordpress.com/|Brikolodge]]</nowiki> on 2/21 to make Florida's contribution to the Ubuntu GlobalBugJam.  Even if you've never triaged a bug, you can make a contribution!  Its gonna be the best BugJam ever in Florida!
